website_summaries.verdict: The 2nd edition of the Flex Appeal does not get away much from its previous performance and style. It is still a flexible shoe with just enough arch support for quick runs and remains to be a consistent head-turner. For those who are looking for a great blend of functionality and style that will still make the wallet smile, this shoe should be a worthy option.
pros: Extremely comfortable is often repeated in most of the reviews of the Skechers Flex Appeal 2.0
A large number of users found it very stylish
Several mentioned that it is very flexible
The exceptional flexibility of the Flex Appeal 2.0 helps with the natural movement of the foot
A significant number of runners noted that the shoe is already very comfortable right out of the box
A good number of runners with wide feet found the forefoot and toe box to their liking
There are so many color options available
More than a few have used it for workouts
A significant number of users who are on their feet for long periods of time loved the comfort and cushioning in this shoe
cons: The outsole accumulates small rocks, according to a handful
The insole was quite hard, according to a few runners
The laces come untied often, based on the comments of more than a couple of reviewers
A handful were disappointed regarding the shoe’s durability

customer_reviews.title: My mom loved them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom as when she was shopping for a new pair she said that they had been discontinued. Luckily i found them on amazon for a cheap price. Apparently the best sketchers trainers that they made. Its a shame they have no stopped making them,
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, nice look shoes.
customer_reviews.text: As you would expect from Sketches these shoescarc Comfortable, light weight And look nice. Two sets of laces, one blue and one pink, so you can change your look. A nice shoe for the summer and look good with crops, shorts or trousers.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cockers

customer_reviews.title: I can only say from my point of view they were very comfortable, a little hot sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Have bought two pairs of these , one for my Mum and one for me. I can only say from my point of view they were very comfortable , a little hot sometimes. very good if you need extra suspension.! My only complaint is that my toe came through the material after light use in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: fresh air fiend

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. She absolutely loves these. They look great and feel great too. She wore these for a holiday in Orlando and never had any sore feet throughout the 2 weeks we were there.Great price on Amazon compared to high street shops.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Gill

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight..very soft upper
customer_reviews.text: Lovely lightweight Skechers with very soft upper. I bought the Blue Marine and found the orange part on back of ankle area too bright and returned them but style itself was perfect. Will probably reorder in different colour. Love the blue/navy but none in my size..acht!
customer_reviews.author: JennyPet22

customer_reviews.title: Colourful comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Very soft comfortable to wear. The pink bit across the heel is a bit stiff but when you start walking you do not notice. These shoes are good for wearing around. Im not a long walker so they suit me fine. I am very happy with them and nice colour too and also a pair of pink laces to add more change of colour. Thank You Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: safy

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers I'm a size 5 these trainers were a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers I'm a size 5 these trainers were a little too large I sold them to my sister she loves them best comfy trainers she's ever had I give you 5 stars I just used my sandles which I bought from you ages ago thank you
customer_reviews.author: Maisie Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Just love Sketcher trainers and walkers, so light on your feet and a dream to go walking in. I always get a half size smaller than you normally wear as Sketchers do come up slightly bigger. These trainers are a lovely colour and got them in sale so really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight
customer_reviews.text: Not worn them yet as they are really summer weight. There two sets of laces, one black and one white. I shall wear them when on holiday in the dry weather - hopeful of good weather!
customer_reviews.author: peggie

customer_reviews.title: Very trendy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are very comfortable and fit correctly (I am a size 5). I previously had a pair of Go Walk but they were slightly too small but these are perfect. They look good with the pink laces, very trendy for a pensioner!
customer_reviews.author: bluebell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and comfortable, brought these for holiday which involves quite a bit of walking around, best shoes I've ever brought, will be getting another pair especially as the price was the cheapest I've found

customer_reviews.title: You can never go wrong with Skechers!
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable, you can walk for miles in these without any issues. This is the second pair that I have bought and I would highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for gym use.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable trainers for gym use. My wife says that they are very, very light so may not stand up to aggressive use outside of the gym but for indoor use are absolutely ideal.

customer_reviews.text: These trainers are brilliant. They are very comfortable and feel like you have nothing on they are so light. Would certainly buy again. Thank you Skechers.

customer_reviews.text: I love sketchers every pair I've had have fitted perfectly and the most comfortable shoes you'll ever wear, plus they look amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and light
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and comfortable, enough room for my orthotics and my feet! I got a second pair. Nice and light.

customer_reviews.text: I like them very much. Id like to buy more but i dont see them now

customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife and she raves about them. Great price and delivery. She tells me they are the most comfortable thing she has ever had on her feet

customer_reviews.title: The best trainers I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: These Skechers Go Step Trainers are fantastic, they fit like a glove and are so comfortable to wear; This was the first time I have bought any Skechers and I am so pleased with them that I have bought a second pair of Skechers Trainers.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful inside and out

customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Slightly generous fit, but that leaves room for thicker socks in the cold weather. So comfy. I have plantar fasciitis and these really help.

customer_reviews.title: These are so comfortable. I was a bit worried when ordering as ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. I was a bit worried when ordering as I take size UK 7 (Euro 41) and it said the European size was 40 so I thought they might be too small but they fit perfectly. They are so light and bouncy I can't wait for it to stop raining and snowing so I can wear them outside more !

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant shoes. I walked 5 miles wearing them and was very happy with them. I have arthritis in my knees and had no pain at all during or after the walk. The insoles are fantastic. I highly recommend Skechers to anybody that has joint pain.

customer_reviews.title: I love long walks but sometimes struggle due to knee and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Skechers. These are my 6th pair but 1st pair of trainers. I love long walks but sometimes struggle due to knee and back pain caused by arthritis. These trainers are the most comfortable shoes ever. They look great too. Lightweight and not too hot.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a pity.
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable, light and flexible. I would have given them 5 stars, but I have found them dangerous to drive in. The discs on the sole caught under the edge of my accelerator pedal and I could not move my foot from accelerator to brake. This only lasted a few seconds but was enough to frighten me. I shall now only use them for walking, which is a pity as I do a lot of driving.
customer_reviews.author: Expat Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great - light and airy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect spring/summer runner, great for light walking and gym. Oh and shopping lol. Fit as expected - I’m a 6 to 6.5, (although a 5 with go walk slip-ins as they run big) so 6 is perfect as expected. Got them at a great price (daily deal) not sure I would pay over £40 as they are not as hardy as most normal sketcher lace ups.
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Go Step Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers, fit well, great colour and very comfortable. Recommended.

product_meta.title: Skechers womens 12753 Flex Appeal 2.0 Black Size: 5 UK
product_meta.description: Lace-up the women's Flex Appeal 2.0 sneaker and show off your athleisure lifestyle. With an Air Cooled Memory Foam insole, these sleek low-tops will take you anywhere in comfortable style!
feature_bullets: Lace-up with padded collar and tongue
